## CLIConfigurationSpec.delay property

The default delay.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly delay?: Delay;
```

## Remarks

It can be changed at request level in the [hook](./kassette.configurationspec.hook.md) method through [mock.setDelay](./kassette.imock.setdelay.md)<!-- -->.
